name: ANYVAN.com
tag_list: delivery, removals, man-and-van, moving-house, sofa-delivery, furniture-delivery, van-hire, courier
overview:
Anyvan.com helps you get cheap delivery quotes from potentially thousands of verified local, national and international removal, delivery and transport companies by matching you with transport companies that are already making a similar journey with room on their vehicles for your items. On our site, companies bid against each other to secure your custom ensuring you only pay the most competitive rates .

Key Benefits to using ANYVAN: â€¢ Significant cost savings â€¢ Save time and let quotes come to you â€¢ Community Powered feedback rating â€¢ Free to use â€¢ No obligation to accept any bid

How it works:

  1. List the details of the items you need to move
  2. Receive quotes from removal companies in your area
  3. Accept bid and pay deposit to secure job

Anyvan.com takes the stress and costs out of finding the right firm to handle your delivery job, whether moving house, getting a motorbike delivered or having an eBay purchase delivered, you’ll find a suitable company at ANYVAN.com. List your requirements with us and within minutes youâ€™ll start to receive bids.

Companies in your area or travelling your way bid against each other to secure your custom â€“ saving you money and time whilst helping the environment.

Anyvan Tips - To get the perfect bid

  1. List your moving requirements as accurately as possible
  2. Communicate with as many transport companies via your message centre until you feel comfortable with the service offered
  3. Beware - the cheapest quote is not always the best quote; there is a fine line between cost and quality.
  4. Use ANYVANâ€™s feedback rating service to gain a better understanding of the potential provider by learning what other customers have to say.
  5. If in doubt ask a question to the transport company or contact us for advice

Let ANYVAN help you find the best quote from the best company.

On completion of the job be sure to leave feedback regarding the service you experienced. Itâ€™s essential you do, as it benefits other users when going through the same selection process. We provide a safe, community-powered environment and your input is invaluable.

List your move today to see how much you can save using Anyvan.com
